creditline: Gift of Thomas Murray in honor of Tadashi and Kazuko Morita
description: tan robe woven with vertical, navy blue and white stripes; navy blue applique trim on sleeve cuffs, bottom hem and body, collar, and back center; sleeve, back, and lower applique trim has curving, white and orange embroidery patterns; solid navy blue collar, with striped orange lining on interior neckline
markings: interior PL, Thomas Murray Collection label: ANU 12119
medium: Cloth: elm-bark fiber; cotton appliqué and embroidery
title: Attush robe
